Cures/Precautions: Drink plenty of water, wipe front to back, urinate after sex, avoid irritants (deodorant sprays, certain birth control).
Prescreption: Antibiotics (e.g., Trimethoprim/sulfamethoxazole, Ciprofloxacin, Nitrofurantoin).

Cures/Precautions: Maintain skin hydration, use non-soap cleansers.
Prescreption: Topical: Corticosteroids, Vitamin D analogues. Systemic: Methotrexate, Oral Retinoids, Biologic therapies (for moderate-to-severe).

Cures/Precautions: Good personal hygiene (regular bathing, handwashing), clean minor injuries, avoid sharing personal items.
Prescreption: Topical Antibiotics (e.g., Mupirocin) for localized. Oral Antibiotics (e.g., Cephalexin, Amoxicillin/clavulanate) for widespread/severe.
